message.name: ERR_PARSING_XML
message.locale: An error has occurred while attempting to parse the Case Evidence Stack XML.

message.name: ERR_CASE_EVIDENCE_STACK_XML_NULL
message.locale: The Case Evidence Stack XML cannot be null.

message.name: ERR_CASE_EVIDENCE_STACK_XML_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The Case Evidence Stack XML is not valid.

message.name: ERR_ON_INSERT
message.locale: An error occurred while attempting to insert a Case Evidence Stack record.

message.name: ERR_ON_MODIFY
message.locale: An error occurred while attempting to modify a Case Evidence Stack record.

message.name: ERR_ON_REMOVE
message.locale: An error occurred while attempting to remove a Case Evidence Stack record.

message.name: ERR_CASE_EVIDENCE_STACK_NAME_NULL
message.locale: The Case Evidence Stack name cannot be null.

message.name: ERR_CASE_EVIDENCE_STACK_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The Case Evidence Stack name cannot be an empty string.

message.name: ERR_CASE_EVIDENCE_STACK_CASEID_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The Case Evidence Stack case id must be entered.
